TopicTitle: Hello, it's 1.0 time, so I tought after lurking for almost 2 years i should join in !

Articles.Content:
I'm Gael, full time .net developper mostly c#, a little passionate about space and space exploration in general.

I play ksp since 0.12 or someting like this right after the ksp base was updated and the old one placed as easter egg.

I tought as a thanks to the ksp team and all of the comunity making mods / playing / helping to make ksp what it has become I would like to share somes of my best screens shots as a summary of my ksp experience.

My first orbital satellite to no crash before orbit:

[![2014_03_15_00003.jpg](http://s23.postimg.org/p3mxfku2v/2014_03_15_00003.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/p3mxfku2v/)

First moon landing:

[![2014_03_16_00004.jpg](http://s1.postimg.org/k3bkmclkr/2014_03_16_00004.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/k3bkmclkr/)

This is one of my favourite design a rcs powered ground vehicule with such a silly design that works very well ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) (If I can 3D print one design it should be this one) :

[![2014_03_17_00009.jpg](http://s16.postimg.org/60ge9dm01/2014_03_17_00009.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/60ge9dm01/)

Because ksp is beautifull:

[![2014_05_14_00001.jpg](http://s1.postimg.org/kbdg7ghmj/2014_05_14_00001.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/kbdg7ghmj/)

[![2014_03_27_00002.jpg](http://s14.postimg.org/rv0ovcz8d/2014_03_27_00002.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/rv0ovcz8d/)

[![2014_03_26_00002.jpg](http://s9.postimg.org/tpngl70az/2014_03_26_00002.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/tpngl70az/)

[![2014_03_26_00003.jpg](http://s14.postimg.org/9oie1mna5/2014_03_26_00003.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/9oie1mna5/)

My most advanced station (that glitched out on it's way to eve (it was meant to be ion powered and was working great until time warp and missing part that got eaten by the Kraken...):

[![2014_05_17_00009.jpg](http://s12.postimg.org/b3ynsobuh/2014_05_17_00009.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/b3ynsobuh/)

This one I'm very proud of:

[![2014_07_14_00001.jpg](http://s7.postimg.org/aaomxojpj/2014_07_14_00001.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/aaomxojpj/)

At first I tought that to get back a Kerbal for the mission you had to grab it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif), so I managed to do it, then he died on re-entry...

[![2014_11_16_00003.jpg](http://s16.postimg.org/x296ohig1/2014_11_16_00003.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/x296ohig1/)

A probe design:

[![2014_11_24_00002.jpg](http://s28.postimg.org/ocnl4dxrt/2014_11_24_00002.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/ocnl4dxrt/)

[![2014_11_24_00005.jpg](http://s1.postimg.org/86ozyzpyz/2014_11_24_00005.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/86ozyzpyz/)

Some more candy:

[![2014_12_02_00006.jpg](http://s17.postimg.org/v0upsrjqz/2014_12_02_00006.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/v0upsrjqz/)

[![2014_12_02_00008.jpg](http://s23.postimg.org/j5nctxw7b/2014_12_02_00008.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/j5nctxw7b/)

[![2014_12_02_00009.jpg](http://s17.postimg.org/52vp0h3nf/2014_12_02_00009.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/52vp0h3nf/)

[![2014_12_02_00018.jpg](http://s12.postimg.org/5tbs1sf09/2014_12_02_00018.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/5tbs1sf09/)

[![2014_12_02_00024.jpg](http://s3.postimg.org/f9nnh1bwf/2014_12_02_00024.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/f9nnh1bwf/)

[![2014_12_07_00004.jpg](http://s13.postimg.org/6jc4b7p1v/2014_12_07_00004.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/6jc4b7p1v/)

[![2015_02_20_00001.jpg](http://s8.postimg.org/9osg89xnl/2015_02_20_00001.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/9osg89xnl/)

[![2015_02_22_00002.jpg](http://s1.postimg.org/swpm0z29n/2015_02_22_00002.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/swpm0z29n/)

[![2015_02_22_00004.jpg](http://s1.postimg.org/m8t0edirf/2015_02_22_00004.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/m8t0edirf/)

[![2015_02_22_00005.jpg](http://s1.postimg.org/49ych5hrv/2015_02_22_00005.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/49ych5hrv/)

[![2015_02_22_00007.jpg](http://s1.postimg.org/59k1z47jv/2015_02_22_00007.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/59k1z47jv/)

[![2015_02_22_00011.jpg](http://s1.postimg.org/gw4608uuz/2015_02_22_00011.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/gw4608uuz/)

[![2015_02_22_00013.jpg](http://s1.postimg.org/cgqc8q7uj/2015_02_22_00013.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/cgqc8q7uj/)

[![2015_02_22_00014.jpg](http://s1.postimg.org/5210gclyz/2015_02_22_00014.jpg)](http://postimg.org/image/5210gclyz/)

And that's all.

I plan to make a mod soon, I want to make a commander mod, that would allow to input order to any kerbal like go there, or make this maneuveur without having to load the ship but by previewing it like the kerbal in iva. The controls would be available in the traking station. I hope to start soon if my work time allow it. 

So if you feel it's a good idea please let me know ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).

Thank you if you are still here, I hope my designs can inspire somes of you and that you enjoyed this post, anyway I'm looking forward for after 1.0, and the future of ksp.
Welcome aboard, finally! Man, you should've joined waaaaay sooner... Those crafts and pictures are amazing!

Welcome SpacePsilo! Good to have you in the forums.

Happy landings!

Hmmm PICs nom nom, me like pics!

And yeah welcome to the Kerman family!
